name: Orbital Station - FSF
desc: The Orbital Station, designed by FSF, boasts extraordinary firepower potential. It effectively prevents any orbital bombing from occurring.

name: Battle Base - FSF
desc: The upgraded battle station now has all necessary modules mounted, effectively preventing any orbital bombing attempts.

name: Star Fortress - FSF
desc: A fully armed star fortress, equipped with additional modular armor to protect the outer platform, effectively prevents any orbital bombardment.

name: Advance D&R Department
desc: It remains a mystery why the FSF has been experiencing a massive expansion in its arsenal in recent years. However, battle-experienced, loyal, and background-checked officers are joining the department. Isolated from public scrutiny, this move is seen as the company's prediction of impending tremendous chaos.
